Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Truth or dare... Do I really have to choose one of these?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You and Watanabe approach the challenge wheel for a chance to win raffle tickets for the grand prize.'}
{3: 'According to the rules, completing either a "truth" or "dare" is going to earn you a chance to win a "Limited Edition Constellia Kitchen Set" through the raffle.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe stands at the raffle booth with just a few groups in line before him, yet he still appears completely indecisive.'}

{2: 'Might as well enjoy it since this is part of the festivities.', 3: '14', 4: 'To be honest, these "either-or" things aren\'t really my cup of tea, but I heard we\'d miss out on the festival\'s grand prize if we didn\'t participate.', 5: '14'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You have a point. I guess I can be a little more chill since this only happens once a year.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Your response seems to have helped Watanabe make up his mind at last. He takes a deep breath and walks onto the stage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Dare, please.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "Ta-da-daaa! Now let's see what challenge awaits!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The colors on the wheel spin rapidly across the display screen before the wheel finally stops, its needle pointing at a cyan-blue number.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: 'Alright, Team 12, congratulations!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Now, what you need to do is... "Sing a song for your partner where everyone can see you!"', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Where everyone can see us?!', 3: '35', 4: "This is perfect! I'm starting to love it.", 5: '35'}
{3: "Watanabe clearly didn't see this coming. Having been ushered off the stage with a festival voucher in hand, he seems as stiff as a rock."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "It's not until the two of you find a cafe around the corner of a street and sit down that he finally comes back to his senses."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I... don\'t particularly dislike the idea of "singing a song for someone." In fact, I don\'t even dislike singing at all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's just that this thing is such a cliche, and I never thought people still did it today...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ditto.', 3: '47', 4: "I think it's gonna be lots of fun.", 5: '47'}
{2: 'But anyhow, let\'s figure out where "people can see us."', 3: '48'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That doesn't seem difficult at all.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He points at a cafe—where, on the inside, a simple stage bears a sign that reads, "Performances are suspended because our resident singer is on break. We apologize for any inconvenience."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Well... guess this is where we step in to fill the role, no?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What do you think?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Can't think of a reason to say no.", 3: '56'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory780.jpg'}
{3: "Just as Watanabe thought, the cafe's owner promptly and happily offers you and Watanabe the stage when the two of you approach him."}

{3: 'The modest stage is quickly decorated to shine with dazzling lights, with a gleaming white disco ball slowly spinning on the ceiling. The occasional scattered whistles from the audience suddenly make you nervous.'}
{3: 'This might just be a daring challenge, but you know that people are gonna boo you all the same if your performances suck.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Feeling nervous?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sensing your unease, Watanabe sits down next to you with a borrowed wooden guitar.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Don't worry. We played this piece together during practice. You'll definitely do great.", 4: '1'}
{2: "This is a duet, though. You sure they won't count this as cheating?", 3: '72'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Nowhere in the rules says we can't do this, though.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'We just so happen to be singing each other the same song, right?', 3: '75'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Exactly.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He gently pats your shoulder, then hands you a slightly cold metal object.'}
{3: "In the dim stage lighting, you see that the object is an ordinary old tin harmonica. While covered in scratches, it's been meticulously maintained to a clean, polished shine."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Ahem... If you don't want to sing, you can use this harmonica instead.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Theater Owner', 3: 'Hello, the stage is ready. Feel free to step up...'}
{3: "With the cafe owner's call, the audience erupts into thunderous applause."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.3'}
{3: 'Watanabe walks onto the stage, glances around, acknowledges the audience with a nod, then sits down with his guitar.'}
{3: 'Following Watanabe, you sit down by a music stand and raise the harmonica to your mouth.'}
{3: "The arpeggio rippling through the air when Watanabe's fingertips gently brush across the strings comes to a stop when he presses down on the strings to silence the lingering echoes."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Thank you all for being here. I'm your impromptu performer for tonight.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The microphone's mixing amplifies the faint tremor in Watanabe's voice, but he doesn't sound nervous at all."}
{3: "In Watanabe's prelude, the chords on his guitar seem to melt into the golden light in the cafe."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This next song is dedicated to the most important person in my life, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
